Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.notifications

Class Notification

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.notifications.Notification
public class Notification extends Object
This class represents a notification, an object whose function is to deliver messages to Users

  • Constructor Details

    • Notification

      public Notification(int id, String emailReceiver, String msg)
      This constructor associates the notification's data provided by the NotificationHandler with the creation date and time
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier number of the created notification
      emailReceiver - a String that allows to trace back to the notification's recipient User
      msg - a String that represents the real message to communicate

  • Method Details

      returns the Integer number that identifies a notification

      Returns:

      Parameters:
